name: Enchanted Forest
description: A magical forest filled with mysterious creatures.

npcPool.description: Goblins often gather here to plot their next mischief.
Elves are known to protect these sacred woods.
Seldom, trolls venture out into these parts of the forest.

name: Haunted Castle
description: An ancient castle, rumored to be haunted by vengeful spirits.

npcPool.description: The spirits of the former inhabitants are said to still haunt these halls.
Vampires are rumored to stalk the night in this cursed place.
A powerful lich is said to rule over the castle's horrors.

name: Dragon's Den
description: A treacherous cave dwelling where an ancient and powerful dragon resides.

npcPool.description: This den is home to a powerful and ancient dragon.
Goblins often find refuge in the protection of the dragon.
Trolls adapted to the darkness of caves sometimes inhabit these parts.

name: Mystic River
description: A serene river known for its magical healing properties.

npcPool.description: Water elementals are drawn to the river's magic.
Fishermen and other folk are often found by the river.
Rarely, serpents rise from the river's depths.
